goal: GeoUnion was established to support scientific collaboration between the geosciences and with neighbouring disciplines and to disseminate the importance, research questions and achievements of the geoscientific disciplines into the general public. GeoUnion organizes conferences, lecture series, seminars and publications to bring geosciences to a wider audience, GeoUnion accords the label "National Geopark in Germany".
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation
